events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience in software development and devops.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your case to guide you through the recruitment process.
Your initial screening interview has been completed with positive feedback regarding your skills and experience in software engineering.
Thank you for your prompt response to the screening outcome; you have expressed enthusiasm about moving forward in the process.
We have scheduled your technical interview for next week to further evaluate your engineering expertise and problem-solving skills.
Your technical interview has been completed successfully, with strong performance noted in coding and system design exercises.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your fit within the company culture and go over employment terms.
You have completed the HR interview with positive feedback on your communication and alignment with company values.
A formal job offer has been sent to you outlining the terms of employment and benefits for the Software Engineer role.
We have received your feedback regarding the offer and are pleased to note your interest in joining our engineering team.
You have accepted the job offer, and we are excited to have you join our software engineering department.
Your onboarding process has started, including access setup, introductions to the dev team, and initial training schedules.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with your full integration into the engineering team completed.
